recently_narrative:
The most significant operational pattern observed across the article titles is a strategic shift towards AI-powered features and integrations, coupled with a focus on streamlining customer support operations through platform consolidation and automation.

This suggests that Zendesk administrators need to prioritize the evaluation and testing of new AI-driven capabilities, while also carefully managing the integration and migration of existing tools and workflows to ensure a seamless transition for their organizations. Administrators should also be prepared to adapt to the evolving Zendesk ecosystem and the changing needs of their customers.

release_notes.summary:
1. Support added incremental export APIs for custom objects to enable customers to build reports on their custom object data in external reporting tools.

2. AI Agents Advanced released the unified request view and enabled agents to rate their own tickets where they are requestors, but fixed an issue where agents could no longer change a CSAT score for tickets they are not requestors of if they discover a link.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-09-19
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Support
AI Agents Advanced
Products with no updates this week
